review: Great streaming device for the money.

review: It's everything I expected and more! Great Product!

review: My dumb TV is now a smart TV. Love it
author: Carl Devitz

review: A great addition to the already owned Fire TV box. This will be our travel Fire TV source and while we have yet to use it (this coming week will be first try) the price is great and the familiarity with the Fire TV will make the use easy.Good job Amazon!
author: Patrick Murphy "maverick"

review: Can't believe all the things this little device does! I rather pay for service off this, rather than paying for cable!
author: Melissa Martin
